name: Rosie's Quest
description:
Rosie's Quest

A platform game made for GBJam 5. This game is our very first game ever. Enjoy playing!

Controls:

In game:

w - a - s - d or arrows = walking and climbing

spacebar = jump

e or x = pick up and throw

esc = menu

Menu:

w - a - s - d or arrows = move arrow

spacebar or return = select

esc = close menu

Art and lead: Hanneke Lovink

Programmer: Ruben Nijveld

Sound: Michiel Nijhof

Enjoy!
